column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Excellent meal! The service was quick
column2: even though the place was packed. We went on a Monday morning around 10am and waited for a table about 5 minutes
column3: but we were out and finished by 1040am. You have to get the berry bliss anything. That's what this place is known for and they are the best. The skillets are also really good and a lot of food. Excellent start to a morning!
